## WaitForConditionWaitStrategyFunc type

Function that determines whether to continue waiting and how long to delay

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type WaitForConditionWaitStrategyFunc<T> = (
  state: T,
  attempt: number,
) => WaitForConditionDecision;
```
